sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT G.GOODS_CODE, GOODS_NM, GOODS_INTRCN, FILE_CODE, GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_SN), '') FROM TB_FILE_DETAIL WHERE FILE_CODE = G.FILE_CODE AND LIVEVIEW_AT = 'Y' ) AS FILE_SN, RNUM , G.VIDEO_URL FROM ( SELECT GOODS_CODE, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT GOODS_CODE FROM TB_GOODS WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND VIDEO_MAIN_EXPSR_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_ORDR ) A ) AA INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON AA.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE /*WHERE AA.RNUM <= 5*/ ) A /*RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEVEL AS LV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 5) B ON A.RNUM = B.LV ORDER BY B.LV*/
SELECT GOODS_CODE, GOODS_NM, FILE_CODE, GOODS_INTRCN_SIMPL, VIDEO_URL FROM TB_GOODS G WHERE VIDEO_URL IS NOT NULL AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY GOODS_CODE
